UserDialog.Title: Hey!
UserDialog.Message: If you have done 0 Makeb quests you should fly to Makeb and then start this profile at Makeb orbitial station. If you have already done quests you should start this profile in the area with the quests you are currently on.

TurnInQuest.QuestName: The Monstrous Mesa of Solida Hesk

CompleteQuest.QuestName: The Monstrous Mesa of Solida Hesk

UserDialog.Title: BuddyWing needs your help!
UserDialog.Message: Bot can't handle killing these tanks because of their small hit box and they have collision. Ranged classes can handle killing them but will keep running into the tank trying to loot it. Melee won't even be able to kill them at all since they won't be able to get in range to kill them. Warriors might be the only class that might not have problems if they can keep on top of the tank via force leap/charge. Anyways kill 3 hover tanks and then click ok.

UserDialog.Title: BuddyWing needs your help!
UserDialog.Message: Bot can't handle talking to mobs after fighting them so kill/talk to Lurker and click ok.

UserDialog.Title: BuddyWing needs your help!
UserDialog.Message: Bot can run into problems navigating through this area also mobs knocking you off can cause problems. For the last part of the quest in this area, the bot can not find its way to the elevator. Basically you need to watch and help the bot in this area.

If.If: //UserDialog Title="BuddyWing needs your help!" Message="Bot can't talk to this guy since his location is where ever he is killed at. May be able to get it working if I put like 20 hotspots all over this area. Anyways click ok after talking to him. " /> || || || || || || || || || ||

UserDialog.Title: BuddyWing needs your help!
UserDialog.Message: Bot can't handle this fight so pwn The Archon and talk to him then click ok.
